The Huffman Tree
----------------

((a 19 i) 24 ((y 14 (w 6 l)) 21 (((z 2 k) 7 d) 15 (c 8 b)))) 26 ((((p 9 ((q 1 x) 3 f)) 16 (s 10 *)) 22 ((r 11 t) 17 ((h 4 g) 12 m))) 25 (((n 13 (j 5 v)) 18 e) 23 (u 20 o)))

	Freq	Symbol	Code
	----	------	----
	90	a	000
	30	b	01111
	30	c	01110
	30	d	01101
	90	e	1101
	20	f	100011
	20	g	101101
	20	h	101100
	90	i	001
	22	j	110010
	17	k	011001
	27	l	01011
	42	m	10111
	42	n	11000
	90	o	1111
	32	p	10000
	7	q	1000100
	40	r	10100
	40	s	10010
	40	t	10101
	90	u	1110
	23	v	110011
	25	w	01010
	10	x	1000101
	45	y	0100
	10	z	011000
	40	*	10011

Weighted external path length of tree: 4801

Encoding
--------

cats*and*dogs
 ---> 0111000010101100101001100011000011011001101101111110110110010
data*structures
 ---> 01101000101010001001110010101011010011100111010101111010100110110010

Decoding
--------

0111000010101100101001100011000011011001101101111110110110010
 ---> cats*and*dogs
01101000101010001001110010101011010011100111010101111010100110110010
 ---> data*structures
